subprocess_flow.description: Collect all available stock-out data, including frequency, duration, product types, locations, and root causes.
success_criteria: Comprehensive stock-out data is collected and organized.

subprocess_flow.description: Analyze the collected stock-out data to identify patterns, trends, and recurring root causes.
success_criteria: Significant stock-out trends and patterns are identified.

subprocess_flow.description: Evaluate the effectiveness of current demand forecasting methods and identify areas for improvement.
success_criteria: Demand forecasting methods are reviewed and areas for improvement are identified.

subprocess_flow.description: Adjust safety stock levels for specific products based on the analysis of stock-out trends and demand forecasting.
success_criteria: Safety stock levels are adjusted to minimize stock-outs while maintaining optimal inventory turnover.

subprocess_flow.description: Review and optimize inventory control procedures, such as reorder points, order quantities, and inventory tracking methods.
success_criteria: Inventory control procedures are optimized for efficiency and accuracy.

subprocess_flow.description: Communicate proactively with suppliers to address any supply chain issues, negotiate better lead times, and improve delivery reliability.
success_criteria: Supplier relationships are strengthened, leading to improved supply chain performance.

subprocess_flow.description: Provide additional training to staff on inventory management procedures, stock-out reporting, and the importance of accurate data collection.
success_criteria: Staff is adequately trained on inventory management procedures.

subprocess_flow.description: Regularly monitor the effectiveness of preventive measures and adjust them as needed based on ongoing stock-out data and performance metrics.
success_criteria: Preventive measures are continuously monitored and adjusted for optimal effectiveness.
